message: I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000.
I appreciate your time and consideration, but I'm looking to make a more reasonable offer. I'm willing to pay $900000 for the product.
I understand you're looking to make a more reasonable offer, but I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, though. I'm counteroffering at $1100000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product.
I'm not willing to go as low as $950000, but I'm willing to make another concession. I'm counteroffering at $1050000. This is my final offer, and I'm confident it's a fair price for the product.
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still not willing to go above $1000000. I'm willing to pay $1000000 for the product.
